pageProps.articleContent:
This is a base project to quickly spin up a Rails+Tailwindcss application. I'm using it for my rails projects and It helps me to start my new project quickly.

Heroku Link

Quickstart Email: test@test.com Password: 123456

Github

Quickstart

Features

  • Uses Rails, Tailwind CSS and Webpacker.
  • Uses Stimulus and view_component to handle notifications.
  • Uses Devise and PostgreSQL.
  • Uses Font Awesome.

Built with

  • Ruby (3.0.1)
  • Ruby on Rails (6.1.3.1)
  • Stimulus (2.0.0)
  • Tailwindcss (2.1.2)
  • View_component

blogDetails.body_markdown:
This is a base project to quickly spin up a Rails+Tailwindcss application. I'm using it for my rails projects and It helps me to start my new project quickly.

## Heroku Link
[Quickstart](https://quickstart-rails-tailwind.herokuapp.com/)
**Email:** test@test.com
**Password:** 123456

## Github
[Quickstart](https://github.com/MA-Ahmad/quickstart-rails-tailwind)

## Features
- Uses Rails, Tailwind CSS and Webpacker.
- Uses Stimulus and view_component to handle notifications.
- Uses Devise and PostgreSQL.
- Uses Font Awesome.

## Built with

- [Ruby (3.0.1)](https://www.ruby-lang.org/en/)
- [Ruby on Rails (6.1.3.1)](https://rubyonrails.org/)
- [Stimulus (2.0.0)](https://stimulus.hotwire.dev/)
- [Tailwindcss (2.1.2)](https://tailwindcss.com/)
- [View_component](https://viewcomponent.org/)
